name: Cozic
description: A cozy application to play, upload and organize your music

scripts.dev: DEBUG=app:* npm run watch:server & npm run watch:client
scripts.build: npm run prepare-build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:js:client && npm run build:js:server && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets
scripts.prepare-watch: mkdir -p src/client/public/styles && mkdir -p src/client/public/scripts; npm run build:js:vendors; npm run build:assets:dev
scripts.watch:client: npm run prepare-watch; npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.watch:server: node_modules/.bin/nodemon --ignore src/client/ --ignore tests/ --ignore scripts/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore build/ --ignore package.json --exec npm run compile:server

Track.description: upload and store your music on your cozy
